Question: 8a Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
8a Inc.

CES 2024

- 8a Inc. is set to unveil its latest smartphone at CES 2024.
- The smartphone is expected to feature a 6.5-inch OLED display with a high refresh rate.
- It will be powered by the latest Snapdragon processor and will offer 5G connectivity.
- The device is rumored to have a quad-camera setup with advanced imaging capabilities.
- Additionally, it is expected to come with a large battery capacity and fast charging support.
- The smartphone will run on the latest version of the Android operating system with 8a Inc.'s custom UI on top.
Summary_cn:
8a公司。

CES 2024

- 8a公司计划在CES 2024上发布其最新款智能手机。
- 该智能手机预计将采用6.5英寸的OLED显示屏，具有高刷新率。
- 它将由最新款的骁龙处理器提供动力，并支持5G连接。
- 有传言称该设备将配备具有先进成像能力的四摄相机设置。
- 此外，预计还将配备大容量电池和快速充电支持。
- 此智能手机将运行最新版本的Android操作系统，并搭载8a公司自家的定制用户界面。
